subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ron
author: Ron Lederer
full_text:
w  Sorry,  woke me up from a nap when you called.  Will check it out.  Looked at Lilydale site.  Will put on my travel list for next year.  Ron

--- On Tue, 8/19/08, black bear hollow <blackbearhollow@...> wrote:

From: black bear hollow <blackbearhollow@...>
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Ron
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Tuesday, August 19, 2008, 7:48 AM






Ron,

I just thought I'd mention that there is a Spiritualist Group on 
Second Life. www.secondlife. com SL is a virtual reality and you can 
speak via voice or text. Lots of metaphysical meet ups there.

Just thought I'd mention it.

Wisteria
